yacl3.config.auto_leave:config.doAutoLea:
Automatically leaves when your health is lower than the threshold 
 
 You can also toggle this using /toggleautoleave
yacl3.config.auto_leave:config.leaveAt.d:
The health threshold for the above option. 
 
 You can also change this by the command /autoleaveat
autoleave.low_health.disconnect: [Autoleave] Auto quit because your health was below the threshold!
